title: Dog Park, Full-Sized Washer & Dryer in All Units, Accent Wall
posting_body: ['Welcome to your new living experience at Villa Serena Apartment Homes, surrounded by the always vibrant city of Henderson, Nevada.', 'Located within Clark County School District, Villa Serena Apartment Homes offers distinctive and renovated 1, 2 and 3 bedroom floor plans to accommodate your own personal style and touch.', 'Contact a community associate today for your personal tour of Villa Serena.', '-Carports', '-9ft or Cathedral Ceilings', '-Homes WiFi ready with pre-installed modem, provided by Cox.', '-Wood-Style Flooring in Living Area/Kitchen', '-BBQ/Picnic Areas', '-Private Patio/Balcony', '-Cyber Cafe', '-Outdoor', 'Fire Pit', '-Close to Major Freeways US95, 215 Beltway', '-Full-Sized Washer & Dryer in All Units', '-Dog Park', '-Fireplace', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Contact leasing office for details.']
